title: emma
description: An AI web app that enhances the shopping experience on e-commerce sites by using a PostgreSQL database with vectorized embedded data to create highly relevant product suggestions.

title: Tabistar
description: A Next.js web application for finding restaurants, cafes, and events in the Hamptons, New York. A custom built API server is used and stored on a Supabase PostgreSQL database.

title: NegiNeko_Tokyo
description: Custom-built app for remote connection to control overlay for IRL streamers. Streamers could assign moderaters to help manage and update overlays to through websockets, and changes would reflect in real-time.

title: Moxie
description: A market place that allows sellers to split up the price of items that they are selling. Buyers would purchase tickets and when all the tickets are bought, a seller is randomly chosen to win the item.

title: Windward_CM
description: A static website built for a local business designed with Figma and built with Next.js. The animations are custom built with GSAP and deployed with Vercel.

title: The_American_Hotel
description: A redesign for a local restaurant and hotel using Wordpress with Elementor. The design was prototyped with Figma and pages have been optimized for SEO.

title: Samantha_Rothberg_Fitness
description: A custom-built Wordpress website with Elementor with custom GSAP animations and integrated user booking functionality. Pages have been optimized for SEO.

title: Cruz_Brothers_Construction
description: Custom build wordpress website with custom animations. Worked with Cruz Brothers Construction's internal marketing team to integrate ensure all deliverables and requirements are met.

title: The_Hampton_Maid
description: Custom design/build of a landing page for R.AIRE on Wix. The color scheme, typeface, and design has been changed from the Hampton Maid to reflect a high-end dining experience.
